description: A dashboard to use to debug a running varnish instance. Easily track requests, cache hits, network i/o, sessions, threads, bans, ban lurker and the ban list size

panels.description: Data transfer per second, which consists of headers and body bytes in the backend requests and backend responses.
panels.title: Data transfer per second

targets.legendFormat: Number of objects purged with YKey
Number of slicer objects purged with YKey (MSE4)
Objects killed by bans for cutoff (lurker)
Number of slicer objects purged with YKey (MSE3)

panels.description: The number of backends that are marked as sick due to failing health probes or being manually set to sick via varnishadm.
panels.title: Sick backends

targets.legendFormat: Backend conn. waited in queue and did not get a connection
Client requests received, subject to 417 errors
Number of unresolved DNS lookups from vmod_goto's DNS
Client requests received, subject to 400 errors
targets.refId: Client requests received, subject to 400 errors

targets.legendFormat: Delivery failed due to insufficient workspace.
targets.refId: Delivery failed due to insufficient workspace.

targets.legendFormat: Objects from unreachable stores in the books
Allocation request failure due to a timeout
llocation request failure due to no slot available
Segment remap failure to produce towards the reserve
Segment pruning failure to produce towards the reserve
IO engine has been request limited
Persisted objects with at least one chunk in memory

panels.title: Number of ykeys in the cache

targets.legendFormat: Number of Vary header instruction keys
Number of objects evicted to gain free book slots
Number of objects evicted during segment pruning
Number of ykey iterations taking 0.01s or less
Number of ykey iterations taking between 0.01s and 0.1s
Number of ykey iterations taking between 0.1s and 1s
Number of ykey iterations taking more than 1s

title: Varnish metrics
